name: Spaaaace!
description:
Controls:
W - Move Up
A - Move Left
S - Move Down
D - Move Right
LMB - Shoot

Info:
Waves increase every 45 seconds decreasing spawn time by 5 seconds
You regain +1 health every 15 seconds ( You will need it, trust me)
Points really dont matter but it's in case you want a new PR

Notes: Content updates of this game have suspended until the game gains popularity. I encourage feedback and suggestions on how to improve gameplay and possible content additions.
